description:
1、雅思类频典——willow /wiləu/ n.柳，柳树，柳木制品

【视例】- Teacher and subject. - Miss Hoover. Wind in the Willows.

-老师及考试科目。-胡佛老师。《柳树风声》

——来自于《The Simpsons Season 10 (7)》

2、托福类频典——clarify :['klærə.fai] vt.澄清, 阐明

【视例】Can you clarify for me？

你能为我解释一下吗？

——来自于《Ghost Whisperer Season 4 (18)》

频典原创团队微博，速度粉一个：

日语薇视频http://weibo.com/2086048514

英语薇视频http://weibo.com/2085857290

title: 【频典16秒】微视频记单词——柳树和解释

description:
The robot vacuum-riding cat in a shark suit has returned with another viral video.穿着鲨鱼服骑着吸尘器兜风的猫咪的视频近日又成了热门。

Like the video that first brought him fame, CatShark—aka Max-Arthur—rides a Roomba floor cleaner while wearing his suit.在之前的视频中，这只现在大红大紫的“鲨鱼喵”猫咪Max-Arthur穿着鲨鱼服，骑着Roomba地板清洁机在房间里兜风。

But instead of hungrily chasing a baby duckling, CatShark appears just to be on a kitchen joy ride in this new video as his owner shucks corn in the background.而在这只新视频中，鲨鱼喵没有追着小鸭子到处跑，而是慢悠悠在享受厨房兜风的乐趣，背景中还有它的主人在剥玉米。

The original video was uploaded to Youtube in November 2012 and now has nearly three million views.之前的视频是2012年11月上传到Youtube上的，如今已经有300万的点击量了。

The new video has been posted as a tribute to Shark Week, Discovery Channel’s week of programming dedicated to the undersea scourge.新的视频是最近才上传的，是为向美国探索频道的《鲨鱼周》致敬，这个节目是为引起大家对这种可怕的海洋生物的关注。

In just two days, the newest addition to the CatShark library had already amassed 650,000 views. Though, the people who watch it can’t always say what the appeal of the video is precisely.仅仅两天，这个“鲨鱼喵”的新视频就获得了65万点击量，不过就算是爱看视频的人们也说不清道不明，到底这个视频为什么有这么大的吸引力。

‘[My] partner just walked up and asked "why are you watching a cat in a shark suit sitting on a roomba going around a kitchen while a woman peels corn?"’ wrote Kara Cosser, the top-rated commenter on the Youtube video. ‘I had no answer...’Youtube视频页面最受欢迎的评论来自Kara Cosser，这位网友表示：“我爱人走进来问我‘为什么你在看一只猫穿着鲨鱼服蹲在吸尘器上在厨房里溜来溜去，旁边还有个女人在剥玉米的视频?’ 我还真不知道怎么回答......”

title: 萌视频：穿鲨鱼服骑吸尘器兜风的猫
